column4: I would like to permanently disable Slow Keys on Kubuntu Feisty so that it never ever pops up a dialog asking me if I want to turn it on, no matter what keys I hold down
Is there a way to uninstall Slow Keys so that it's not even on my systems anymore?
are you the real cory doctorow?
At least, I'm wearing his underwear and using his computer!
that you use ubuntu that is..

w1ls0n, though I have to tell you that I'm about ready to tear my hair out over Slow Keys turning on every time I hold down the shift key for 8 secs. I generally hold down the shift key whil eI'm thinking about what to type, fingers poised over the keyboard to start a new sentence. Inspiration strikes, I start typing, and all my keystrokes are stolen by
W1ls0n Slow Keys -- and then I have to minimize the top two windows to find the "Do you want Slow Keys" dialog and turn it off

thanks for that's not it -- I need to change the fact that Slow Keys -- even when disabled -- pops up a dialog if you hold down shift for 8+ secs and asks you if you want it turned on

try finding something that automatically capitalizes the first letter of every sentence instead...
